keywords.description: Specific and technical keywords for intent matching.
keywords.$comment:
Each keyword must be a specific bigram or trigram. No duplicates, generic terms or common stopwords. Recommended strategy for GPT intent matching keywords:
• tags: 12 entries
• capabilities: 18–20 derived expressions
• purpose: 10–12 extracted phrases
• domain: 1 reinforcement concept
→ Total: 41–45 curated items per expert

type.description: Fixed type label indicating this is an expert index entry
